notes: This creature was implemented in [[Updates/8.2|Summer Update 2008]].
name: Roaring Water Elemental
behaviour: '''Roaring Water Elementals''' are fast and fight until death.
strategy: If you don't mind using 210 cap you can use [[Helmet of the Deep]] to block water based attack. '''[[Paladin]]s''': Don't try to outrun them because they are very fast, similar to [[Nightmare]]s. Try to bring them down with [[Assassin Star]]s and [[Ethereal Spear]] spell. Try to avoid situations where you need to block more than one because they hit hard. [[Glacier Amulet]] is recommended to fight this monster.
